evidence.text: Person B: I know, it's a bit much. But folks expect this sort of thing-- --and ya gotta give the people what they want! And if you think that's big--

Person B: Wait'll you see this! Walk with me...
Person B: The Oz of Tomorrow!
Person B: Girls-- this road will change the future of Oz. Folks need direction. Once it's built, they'll always know, if they just follow the road, it'll lead `em right to me!
Person B: You keep that. And someday, we'll put it inside there, next to mine. And you'll call this place... your home.
Person B: It's what we hoped for! Eyes in the skies!
Person A: It'll be you, and me, and, hey-- if it makes you happy-- maybe even your friend here--?
